message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1500000. It's a fantastic opportunity, and I believe the value will exceed your expectations. Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $1500000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product.  This is my maximum offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering my needs.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $800000 is significantly below my desired price, I'm willing to compromise. I'm prepared to lower my price to $1000000.  This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a good deal for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  $1000000 is still a bit more than I can afford.  I'm prepared to go as high as $900000.  This is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise.  If this doesn't work, I'll have to move on to another seller.
